products.name: Espresso
products.description: Pure coffee essence in a single shot. Bold, rich, and full-bodied flavor. Perfect for a quick energy boost. Classic choice for coffee lovers.

products.name: Americano
products.description: Smooth espresso diluted with hot water. Lighter in texture but rich in taste. Ideal for slow sipping and long talks. A bold yet balanced cup.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: A creamy mix of milk and espresso. Thick foam crowns the rich base. Velvety texture and deep aroma. Perfect for cozy mornings.

products.name: Latte
products.description: Smooth and milky with espresso core. Gentle flavors ideal for any time. A classic café favorite worldwide. Soft, creamy, and satisfying.

products.name: Mocha
products.description: A blend of coffee and rich chocolate. Sweet, bold, and deeply satisfying. Great for dessert or a cozy night. Chocolate lovers’ delight.

products.name: Flat White
products.description: Creamy milk with a silky finish. Balanced blend of milk and coffee. Subtle, strong, and smooth in one. A refined coffee experience.

products.name: Macchiato
products.description: Espresso topped with a milk kiss. Bold coffee with light foam touch. Strong taste, minimalist style. Ideal for espresso fans.

products.name: Cortado
products.description: Perfect harmony of coffee and milk. Equal parts power and smoothness. Creamy without being too heavy. A balanced classic.

products.name: Iced Coffee
products.description: Chilled and bold, never watered down. A refreshing caffeine kick. Perfect for hot days and cool vibes. Simple and energizing.

products.name: Cold Brew
products.description: Brewed slowly for a smooth taste. Less acidic, more refreshing. Naturally sweet and bold. Coffee in its chillest form.

products.name: Affogato
products.description: Hot espresso meets cold dessert. Creamy, bold, and decadent. A dessert-coffee fusion dream. Sweet and powerful treat.

products.name: Turkish Coffee
products.contents: Finely Ground Coffee Boiled in Pot
products.description: Traditional and deeply aromatic. Foamy, strong, and thick-bodied. Served unfiltered for full flavor. A rich cultural experience.

products.name: Irish Coffee
products.description: Warm coffee with a whiskey twist. Creamy top and bold bottom. Great for evening indulgence. Comfort in a cup.

drink.name: Espresso
drink.description: A concentrated shot of pure coffee, bold and intense.

drink.name: Americano
drink.description: Smooth, bold, and perfect for slow sipping.

drink.name: Cappuccino

drink.name: Latte
drink.description: Mild and milky with rich espresso flavor.

drink.name: Mocha

drink.name: Flat White
drink.description: Silky smooth with balanced espresso and milk.

drink.name: Macchiato
drink.description: Strong espresso topped with a dollop of foam.

drink.name: Cortado

drink.name: Iced Coffee

drink.name: Cold Brew

drink.name: Affogato

drink.name: Turkish Coffee

drink.name: Vienna Coffee

drink.name: Ristretto

drink.name: Doppio

drink.name: Iced Latte

drink.description: Light and creamy, perfect for summer.

drink.name: Caramel Macchiato
drink.description: Sweet caramel flavor layered with espresso.

drink.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
drink.description: Seasonal favorite with cozy autumn vibes.
